text: Danny Lee Burton (born June 21, 1938) is an American politician. Burton is the former U.S. Representative for . He represented the , serving from 1983 until 2013. He is a member of the Republican Party and the Tea Party Caucus. ==References== ==Other websites== *Archive.org – Congressman Dan Burton official U.S. House site – (official site deactivated) *Archive.org – Dan Burton for Congress * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Indiana Category:Politicians from Indianapolis Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Indiana General Assembly
title: Dan Burton
